content: Metamask already enforces a value lower than this due to Limitation for signing

author: sambacha
content:
The value used for metamask is 

MAX_SAFE_CHAIN_ID = floor( ( 2**53 - 39 ) / 2 ) = 4503599627370476

The EIP states: 9,223,372,036,854,775,771 (MAX_CHAIN_ID). This value is floor(MAX_UINT64 / 2) - 36,, which will have issues 


I added details here https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/2294#issuecomment-1297145918
